alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy County through 515 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Armstrong, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Norias and Armstrong Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 730 and 746. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
